snippet: Zach Parise scored two goals Thursday night, including the go-ahead tally with 2 minutes 44 seconds remaining, as the Devils beat the Montreal Canadiens, 5-3, at the Prudential Center in Newark.
abstract: New Jersey Devils defeat Montreal Canadiens, 5-3; other NHL news noted.
lead_paragraph: Zach Parise scored two goals Thursday night, including the go-ahead tally with 2 minutes 44 seconds remaining, as the Devils beat the Montreal Canadiens, 5-3, at the Prudential Center in Newark.

headline.seo: Parise and Clarkson Carry Devils to Victory
headline.main: Parise and Clarkson Carry Devils to Victory
headline.print_headline: Parise and Clarkson Carry Devils to Victory
